Session of DPRK Supreme People's Assembly to Be Convened 
   Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The fifth session of the 11th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK will be convened here on April 11, Juche 96 (2007), according to a decision of its Presidium promulgated Wednesday.
